settings.hero_subtitle: Where Safety Meets Adventure - Advance your career with industry-leading certifications and continuous professional development

settings.feature_description: Proven expertise in safety education and compliance
Credentials that advance your professional career

settings.content_body:
The Amusement Adventure Institute membership connects safety professionals, operators, and industry leaders in a comprehensive network focused on excellence, continuous learning, and career advancement. Our members set the standard for safety in family entertainment and adventure operations worldwide.

With over two decades of industry leadership, AAI provides the knowledge, credentials, and professional network that drives career success in the dynamic entertainment and adventure industry.
For safety professionals, operations managers, and industry specialists seeking career advancement and professional recognition.

settings.list_items: Access to exclusive member-only courses and advanced certifications|Continuing Education Unit (CEU) credit tracking and documentation|Professional certification pathways with recognized credentials|Priority access to new course releases and beta programs

Industry networking opportunities and professional connections|Member directory access for industry networking|Monthly safety bulletins featuring latest industry developments|Discounted conference attendance and special events

settings.content_body: For Family Entertainment Centers, adventure parks, and hospitality organizations committed to safety excellence.

settings.list_items: Team training packages with significant bulk pricing discounts|Custom course development tailored to specific operations|On-site training delivery and consultation services|Group certification tracking and progress monitoring

Corporate compliance reporting and documentation|Dedicated account management and priority support|Executive briefings on industry trends and regulations|Integration with existing learning management systems

settings.content_body: AAI offers clear professional development pathways designed to advance your career in safety management and operations leadership.

settings.block_content: Essential safety principles and industry fundamentals. Perfect for new professionals entering the field.
Advanced safety management and operational excellence. For experienced professionals seeking leadership roles.
Industry leadership and specialized expertise. For senior professionals and consultants.

settings.content_body: Our members consistently achieve career advancement and operational excellence through AAI's comprehensive professional development programs.

settings.block_title: "AAI certification opened doors I didn't know existed"
settings.block_content:
"The comprehensive training and industry recognition from AAI helped me advance from operations manager to director of safety within 18 months. The networking opportunities alone were worth the membership."

- Sarah Mitchell, Director of Safety, Adventure Parks Inc.

settings.title: Join AAI Today
settings.text: Take the next step in your safety career with industry-leading education and professional networking.
